title: pAdamE tuNai
sahitya:
pAdamE tuNai paramashivA bhayankara bhavakkaDal amizhinduzhal enakkunadu


anupallavi

  gItamE muzhangum tirumayilApuri uraiyum krpAnidhi iraivA kapAli nin


caraNam    verparaiyan maghaL karpaga nAyaki minnum Or pAganE mAviDai vAhanE
cirparanE sanakAdi yOgiyarum dEvarum pOTrum dIna sharaNyanE
